title: Addition Sprint
author: Ploynky
essence: Tap the correct answer for small addition problems. After a correct answer, a short countdown starts the next one automatically.
reactions: No penalty for mistakes — try until correct.

title: Subtraction Sprint
author: Ploynky
essence: Practice small non-negative subtractions. TTS announces problems; after a correct answer a countdown moves on.

title: Multiplication Sprint
author: Ploynky
essence: Times tables practice (2–9). Listen to the problem and tap the answer. Auto-advance after a short countdown.

title: Division Sprint
author: Ploynky
essence: Integer divisions from small times-table pairs. TTS reads each problem; auto-advance after correct answers.

title: Memory Match
author: Ploynky
essence: Flip two cards at a time to find matching pairs. A compact 4×4 board keeps rounds short; simple animations let focus stay on visual memory.
reactions: Light strategy: Track positions and test systematically to complete the board.
Friendly design: Big, high-contrast cards that work well on phone screens.
Replayable: Emoji set shuffles every restart for fresh configurations.

title: Tic‑Tac‑Toe Advanced
author: Ploynky
essence: Play against a strong AI. Try to force a draw or win if the AI slips.

title: Word Scramble Game
author: CodeWithRandom
essence: Unscramble the letters to form a word. A fun way to improve vocabulary and spelling.

title: Guess the Word Game
author: CodeWithRandom
essence: Guess the word one letter at a time. A classic hangman-style word game.

title: Math Quiz
author: Ploynky
essence: Mixed math operations quiz. Test your skills with addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
